com.marklogic.hub.deploy.commands

Class CreateGranularPrivilegesCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marklogic.hub.deploy.commands.CreateGranularPrivilegesCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.marklogic.appdeployer.command.Command, com.marklogic.appdeployer.command.UndoableCommand

    public class CreateGranularPrivilegesCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.marklogic.appdeployer.command.Command, com.marklogic.appdeployer.command.UndoableCommand
    Command for creating granular privileges after the resources that these privileges depend on have been created.

        public java.lang.Integer getExecuteSortOrder()
        It is anticipated that these privileges can always be added at the end of a deployment because none of the steps before that should depend on the privileges being added.

      • buildPrivilegesThatDhsMayHaveCreated

        protected java.util.List<com.marklogic.mgmt.api.security.Privilege> buildPrivilegesThatDhsMayHaveCreated(com.marklogic.mgmt.ManageClient client)
        Some of the privileges that need to be created may already exist in DHS. If so, then a role is added to that privilege instead of creating a duplicate one with the same action, which ML does not allow.
        Parameters:
        client -
        Returns:

      • buildScheduledTaskPrivileges

        protected java.util.List<com.marklogic.mgmt.api.security.Privilege> buildScheduledTaskPrivileges()
        Builds a list of privileges to create based on the groupNames configured on this object. If none have been configured, then the groupName in AppConfig is used.
        Returns:
